item.description:
**The movie is also showing on Sunday December 20th @ 11 if anyone is interested in going but can't go on Saturday**

On Saturday December 19th, Criterion will be showing "It's a Wonderful Life", one of my all-time favorite movies. What could be more fun than enjoying a mimosa while watching Jimmy Stewart learn the value of his life with the help of Clarence Oddbody, Angel Second Class?

The movie started at 11 am and I'll be in the lobby at 10:30 am. I know that this movie has drawn a pretty big crowd in the past so I will probably head in for seats around 10:40am so that we can all get seats together. I'll have my cell phone turned on until the movie starts.

Admission is $5 or $4 with a Criterion member card.

It's a Wonderful Life on Wikipedia

It's a Wonderful Life on IMDB

Hope to see you there!
Andrea
203-641-8083

"Every time a bell rings, an angel gets his wings"
item.how_to_find_us: Check out my meetup picture. I'll have my (Andrea) cell phone on until 11.
item.name: It's a Wonderful Life at Criterion 12/19 @ 11am
